newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Robinson Dept Store sets 6.8 bln yen FRN.
newsitem.headline: Robinson Dept Store sets 6.8 bln yen FRN.

text.p: Robinson Department Store Public Co Ltd has launched a 6.8 billion yen floating rate notes issue, arranger Societe Generale Asia said on Thursday.
The notes have a tenor of three years and were priced at par to float at 135 basis points over the yen London Interbank Offered Rate.
Fees are 125 basis points for co-lead managers committing to 400 million yen or more and 115 basis points for managers committing to 200 million yen or more.
The issue was off the borrower's 3.75 billion baht Asian Currency Note Programme.
The other arrangers are Development Bank of Singapore and Banque Francaise du Commerce Exterieur.
Union Europeenne de CIC is an expanded lead manager.
